Hello, In this blog I am gonna walk you through the roadmap for learning React, I've broken down the concept of React into small parts as modules so that It will be easier to understand. This is only for the beginners, Soon I'll publish another blog on advance roadmap of React and also this is just a roadmap(learning path), For learning these concepts I've added the official documentation links(for most of the concepts) where you can go and learn, One interesting thing is that I have also added what you gonna achieve by learning those conceptsüéØ.

Pre-requisitesüìù:
I assume that you have some basic understanding of the following:

Basics of HTML(such as HTML elements, form, table, div and list tags with their attributes).
Basics of CSS(such as styling the html elements, CSS selectors and box model).
Basics of JavaScript(such as variables, conditional statements, loops, data types, DOM manipulation and event triggering).
